Speaker: sterling
Dialogue: I hate to drop in unexpectedly.

Speaker: sterling
Dialogue: Time for a slow boat to China.

Speaker: sterling
Dialogue: Oh bloody hell!

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: Come.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Evening, Sam.

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: What do you have?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Not a whole helluva lot. His final transmission was mangled. About something or someone called "Ahab". Whatever it is, it cost him his life.

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: He was the best there was. That makes three agents lost.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: They're ruthless and they have a lot of firepower. It's only a matter of time before they figure out how to deploy Silent Night. Then we're gonna have a catastrophe on our hands.

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: Silent Night in the hands of a bunch of impertinent cowboys

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: We're gonna have to step in, Sam. Those CIA boys couldn't find a clown in a field of cactus. Let me take care of it.

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: How will you fix it?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: I'll go in with a team. But first I'm going to need some intel. I'll have to put someone inside, someone new, someone they won't see coming. One of their own.

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: So you'll dredge the bottom again. You've done that before. The results were... uneven.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: You wanna find out about rats, ask a rat. I've had my people put together a talent pool. I downloaded it to your desktop.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: The usual prospects. Convicts, contract killers, murde...

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: The scum of the Earth.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: But programmable. And expendable.

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: I've seen enough. Turn it off.

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: They're degenerates. There's not a man in there that would give a damn if the Chinese took over.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: That's exactly why we need them.

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: Get these "scum", Mr. Gibbons, bring them in. Test them. Train them. Find your man.

Speaker: security guard
Dialogue: Crump... I'm sorry, no one by that name.

Speaker: security guard
Dialogue: Hey! You can't go up there!

Speaker: security guard
Dialogue: We've got an intruder in the express elevator!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Sky, you there? Start packin' cause we are out of here!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Did I promise you a fat vacation or what? Get ready to get down in paradise.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Hey, you don't need all this just to go on vacation. Unless this ain't for going on vacation...

Speaker: sky
Dialogue: I'm through, Xander.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I can see that. Why?

Speaker: sky
Dialogue: You run around with maniacs jumping motorcycles in the desert, you break 36 bones crashing wave runners and snowboarding off cliffs, all with no health insurance... It's insane, I can't take it anymore.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I'm having fun, what's the problem?

Speaker: sky
Dialogue: You have all this talent, and you waste it. You won't take a single endorsement deal. Meanwhile those other guys have their own video games! But no, you've got too much "integrity" for that.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I don't wanna go mersh, you know that. But hey, if this is about money...

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I got an advance on the next bootleg. Let's get out of here, just you and me. We'll chill out in Bora Bora for a couple months.

Speaker: sky
Dialogue: French Polynesia? This wouldn't last us a week in a cheap hotel. Do you know how expensive it is down there?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Alright, so I'll get more.

Speaker: sky
Dialogue: It's not about the money, X! You never plan for anything. I can't live like that anymore, I need some stability.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Well if you're bailing, I guess I'd better give you your surprise now.

Speaker: sky
Dialogue: What...?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I was gonna wait till the islands, but...

Speaker: sky
Dialogue: You're serious?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Of course I'm serious. I bought it, didn't I?

Speaker: sky
Dialogue: This is so typical. I can't believe you. I've barely seen you for the last three weeks and now this? Are you out of your mind?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I don't know. I thought this is what you wanted. You want stability, here it is.

Speaker: sky
Dialogue: You can't just propose to me out of nowhere. You think that's going to solve our problems? I'm sorry, X. It was a kick for a while, but it's over. You're just not going anywhere.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You're not exactly "going anywhere" yourself.

Speaker: sky
Dialogue: You're wrong about that. I'm heading out that door right now.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: She had nothing to do with the tower jump. She's nobody. I just met her last night. Tell them.  I hardly know you.

Speaker: sky
Dialogue: Keep the ring. It looks better on you anyways.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: God, I hate cops. What's the charges this time?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You... pussies...

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What the hell?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Hey. Where am I? How did I get here?

Speaker: waitress
Dialogue: I don't know, you wandered in ten minutes ago and put your head down. I told you we were closing.

Speaker: waitress
Dialogue: Want some coffee?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Huh?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You alright?

Speaker: waitress
Dialogue: Fine, just fine. Come on and sit. I'll get you something to eat.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Yeah, sure.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: trucker
Dialogue: I said, you got a problem, boy?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Problem? No, no problem. You go right ahead.

Speaker: trucker
Dialogue: With what? I said, go right on ahead with what?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Whatever, dude.

Speaker: trucker
Dialogue: Alright, nobody make a move!  Shoulda walked away when you had the chance, dumb shit.

Speaker: salesman
Dialogue: Forget him, Buck, let's just do it.

Speaker: trucker
Dialogue: Shut up!  You keep still or I'm gonna make damn sure you stop breathing today. Got that?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Alright, "Buck", whatever you say.

Speaker: trucker
Dialogue: Keep your gotdam mouth shut and empty that register! Couldn't just let him leave, could ya! You know what I'm gonna do to ya for that? Huh? Do ya?!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Better shoot me quick.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Too late!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Alright, bitch, what's going on?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Talk! What's the game? Who are you people?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Who the hell are you?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: The name's Gibbons. You were saying?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What is this place?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Looks like a diner.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Diner, huh? Let me tell you what the problem is. I wake up drugged to find what? You've got a "salesman" over here reading a three week old newspaper. He's pulling a 211 with a "trucker", who happens to be packing a cop issue H&K 9mm. I get tipped that something is going down when she passes me a note. How's that for twisted logic? How did she know there was trouble unless they pulled the guns before I "walked" in? And if that's true, why'd they stop and wait until I woke up to gaffle the money? Then I notice how beefy they both are. Hell, even the waitress is cut. All three of them look like they went through the same training program. Ergo they ain't strangers and this isn't what it seems. That's how I knew yo-yo wouldn't get a round off even if I gave him all day. Why?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Cuz there's nothing but blanks in these guns. And no offense, but their performances were terrible.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Not bad. Not bad at all. Have a seat.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Most guys we ran through this either took off or helped them rob the place. I expected you to do the same.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: That shows me already that you don't have a clue. What's it to you, anyway?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Whether you thought this was for real or not, you jumped in and helped the waitress on instinct. That tells me something about your character.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Good for you. Now why don't you stop wasting my time and tell me what you want. You didn't go through all this for my benefit.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: It's your lucky day. You just might get the chance to pay back our wonderful country for all the freedom you enjoy.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: A Fed, I shoulda known. Who else would have this kind of budget? Now you're gonna hit me with the sales pitch.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Alright, Cage, you've got me. This is one of those moments. "Many are called, few are chosen", that kind of thing. Your government needs you. Are you up for the challenge?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: ..If you're trolling around for narcs, man, have you got the wrong guy.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Why is that?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Look at me, dude, do I look like a fan of law enforcement? Forget the tests, you shoulda just asked me. I woulda saved you a lot of trouble.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Oh I don't know, I think the tests work pretty well. Sometimes they give me answers you wouldn't admit to in a million years.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Are we done now? You've got nothing on me. So if you ain't booking me, I'm walking.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: You've got this wrong. You're not under arrest, you've been abducted. And until I say different, you belong to me.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Is that a fact?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Sure as gravity. I've had a feeling about you from the start, Cage. It's nausea.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You know what I hate? Any scumbag with a clean shirt and a bad haircut can get one of those tin stars and suddenly they think they're God.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: You know what I hate? It's always the assholes that pass the tests.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You bastards love to see me sleep.

Speaker: virg
Dialogue: What's so damn funny?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Been to any good diners lately?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Nobody told me this was a costume party.

Speaker: virg
Dialogue: Heads up, man. What's this thing on my back?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: A parachute. This does not argue well.

Speaker: virg
Dialogue: This is bullshit! Hey!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I get the picture.

Speaker: virg
Dialogue: Jee-zus, man! What the hell now? Another damn test?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Don't look at me, brother. It's every man for himself.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You gotta be kidding me.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You boys are too good for me. Guess I failed this one, huh?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: So much for "every man for himself". Nice to see you again, fellas.

Speaker: virg
Dialogue: Check the table in the corner.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: This oughta be good.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: This must be el jefe. How's it goin' jefe? Some weather we're havin'.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What's on the menu tonight? The old blowtorch-to-the-family jewels routine, I'll bet. Hey, you want roasted nuts, let's break out the Planters.

Speaker: jefe
Dialogue: Do you know what we do with people come round here? You know what we do with people come in our business?

Speaker: jefe
Dialogue: We cut the Achilles tendon. Your feet flop around like a marionette. You ain't walkin' nowhere no more. Sound good, tough guy? Or maybe instead you wanna tell me something.

Speaker: jefe
Dialogue: Whatchu doing here?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Oh, I don't know. It was an accident.

Speaker: jefe
Dialogue: That's some accident, hombre. You accidentally fall out of a plane in the middle of the night and land up in my back yard.

Speaker: jefe
Dialogue: We seen this kind of parachutes before, you know. U.S. Army. You got some friends here, jump out with you guys?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: We're anti-social. We don't have any friends.

Speaker: jefe
Dialogue: No friends, huh? That's funny, I don't know no U.S. Army that comes without no friends. That's cuz U.S. Army is pussies. They always come with the five hundred guys and the helicopters and the see-in-the-dark glasses. So don't you tell me you all alone out here, my friend. You bullshitting the wrong guy.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Who's writing this dude's dialogue?

Speaker: virg
Dialogue: He's a pretty good actor, though.

Speaker: jefe
Dialogue: You ain't begun to see crazy yet, amigo.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: We're on to the game, ese. You got the fake blood splattered all over the walls, you got your torture tools... It's all very cute. But come on, let's quit while you're ahead. I'm only trying to save you a beatin'.

Speaker: jefe
Dialogue: You saving me? You talking pretty tough for a guy got himself chained to the ceiling.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Alright. You wanna eat through a tube, be my guest.

Speaker: jefe
Dialogue: Now you're gonna make me enjoy this, funny guy. Now I'm gonna take the whole foot off. Whatchu think of that?

Speaker: jefe
Dialogue: What's that, eh? I thought you didn't have no friends!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Keys. You got 'em?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Hand 'em to me.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I hope you're getting paid extra for this.

Speaker: virg
Dialogue: They're shooting for real! This is all real.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Aw shit.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Help me with this guy.

Speaker: virg
Dialogue: It's like you said, every man for himself.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: That only works if you're a man!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You alright?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Keep your head down, I'll be right back. I'm gonna steal us some wheels.

Speaker: virg
Dialogue: They're all over the place! What the hell's going on?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Looks like we're in the middle of the drug war.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Alright Mr. free-for-all, you go that way, I'm gonna go this way. They can't follow us both.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Go!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Shit!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I'm gonna need to hit the trees after a night like this.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Nice of you to draw me a bath. Is it Saturday already?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Congratulations, you've just graduated at the head of your class.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You're a cold piece of work. You almost got three people killed out there.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Good thing you were there to save the day. Come walk with me.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: You've really got me confused, Cage. On the one hand you showed leadership, courage under fire, a willingness to protect men you hardly knew... and on the other you have an arrest record that pegs you as near sociopathic. Help me out here. I'm not following your evolution.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You want the cheap backstory? The runaway mom, the suicide dad and the foster homes? Gimme a break. You're not interested in my past, you're interested in my future as some kind of spy.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: You're perceptive too. I forgot to add that to the list of surprises. I'm with the National Security Agency. And unlikely as it may sound, I need your help.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I'm not interested. I've already got a job.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: You're an adrenaline junkie with one foot in the penitentiary. You risk your ass building a daredevil myth that means nothing and you're not getting any younger.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I plan on getting a lot older. And playing spy games sounds like a quick way to get yourself dead.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: That's too bad. I thought a guy like you would appreciate the challenge.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What's this? You're gonna try to scare me now?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Do you know the reason why I try to recruit guys like you? There's no risk.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: There's nobody back home who's gonna ask questions if you just... disappear for a while.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Now I'm the one who's nauseous. So what's the deal? What do you need me for?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: There's some folks I want to keep tabs on. Dirty, tattooed, uncivilized. Your kind of people.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What do I get out of it?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: If you find out what I want to know, and if I'm able to successfully use that information, you get to go back to your degenerate little life. If not, you take a bath.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You're one sick bastard. A sadist with a badge looking to rope me in to a suicide mission. I think no matter which way I go I'm likely to wind up face down on a sheet of plastic. So here's my answer: kiss my ass, Hop-along.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Not bad for a gimp.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: What's with that "X" on the back of your head? Does that mean you're "extreme"? I've got some news for you, Mr. X, you're a three time loser. So maybe you should tattoo another couple of X's on your head.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I'll take that under advisement. Maybe I can be like you and lose a leg for the old Stars and Bars. I bet the flag's a great comfort every time you need help climbing stairs.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: One twitch and my finger and thumb will meet inside your esophagus. Believe me, Mr. X, I've put foot to ass for my country on many occasions and I don't feel the urge to stop just yet. So think carefully before you tell me: Is "kiss my ass, Hop- along" your final answer?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: No.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: I thought you might see it my way.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Where you going, X? I said where you going?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You tell me.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: There better be a movie on this Goddam flight.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: How about a pedicure as long as you're down there. What's this? Lo-Jack?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Wherever you go on the planet, I'll find you. There's no quitting. If you try to take it off, a ring of needles will inject enough curare into your bloodstream to kill you before you hit the ground. Is all that clear?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Yeah, I spy or I die.

Speaker: nerdy agent
Dialogue: This is your communicator. You'll identify yourself by a call sign. From here on out you're Bulldog Omega

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You must stay up late to come up with shit like that.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: I expect you to call in regularly with progress reports.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Fine, but I'm not gonna be no Bulldog

Speaker: agent
Dialogue: Uh... Call signs derive from the parameters of the mission.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: If he doesn't like it, we can make an exception just this once. We'll call him "Triple X".

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Up yours.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Crude and defiant as always, Triple X. It fits so well because you're obscene.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Is that all?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Just remember, I'll be watching.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I've got something for you to chew on. Next time you send someone to save the world, make sure they like the planet the way it is.

Speaker: kid
Dialogue: What game is that?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Slick graphics, huh? See these dudes? They're called "Anarchy 99", they're the bad guy bosses.

Speaker: kid
Dialogue: Do they have any special powers? The bosses always have special powers.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You wanna check it out? Come here.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: First we've got Anders, the psycho looking biker. In charge of transportation and smuggling. Controls every trucking union in Eastern Europe. Don't look too clean, either.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Next we got a Siberian redneck, Viktor. Into snowmobiles and snowboarding. So naturally, he covers prostitution and the drug trade.

Speaker: kid
Dialogue: Naturally.

Speaker: kid
Dialogue: This guy's kinda dorky lookin'.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Kirill, the sniper. Looks like a bookworm, but he had 72 confirmed kills in Chechnya, they called him the "Finger of God". Assassination and weapons.

Speaker: kid
Dialogue: Who's the hottie?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You like her, huh? Petra. She runs their finances, money laundering, computers. Joined the gang after spending some time as the girlfriend of this dude, Yorgi Azar Zimin. Capo

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Yorgi masterminded the take-over of three Red Mafiya clans. Cops called it "blood week". He combined all of their global enterprises into one

Speaker: kid
Dialogue: "Anarchy" 99"?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What are you gonna do? They're Euro- trash.

Speaker: kid
Dialogue: What weapons do you have?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Just about anything I want, it looks like. This is gonna be tough, though. There's no way to save this game. I gotta get it right the first time through.

Speaker: kid
Dialogue: What do you get if you finish?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Nothing, really. My guy is just doing it to stay alive.

Speaker: kid
Dialogue: Oh. I bet by the end he gets something out of it.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Like what?

Speaker: kid
Dialogue: He gets to be the hero.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: This is bullshit, man, I wanna see some ID.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You're both named Ivan? That's gotta be confusing on Valentine's Day. So where we headed? Fellas, I said where we headed?  Yeah, whatever.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: James Bond never had to put up with this shit.

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: Sit down.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I've been on a plane for twelve hours, I think I'll stand.

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: My name is Slovo, Czech secret police. When you are here you are under my jurisdiction, you take my orders, you do what I say. If you become any kind of an inconvenience, I'll shoot you.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Here we go again.

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: You're here because your government is putting pressure on my government. This is an internal affair, a Czech affair, that you are interfering with. I will warn you once: Don't shit in my lawn. Get whatever information your government seeks and get our.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: First of all, you should kill whoever sold you that suit. Two, I don't wanna be here either, so just step off. Three, if you had the authority to shoot me you would've done it by now, so just ease up on the machismo, bitch. Now that we've got that sorted out, I'm gonna get some rest.

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: Be ready in three hours.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Nice hops.

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: See the one with the funny colored hair? Crazy bitch stabbed one of my men in the knee-cap. There they are, American. The low-rent millionaire criminals. And you thought only your country had white trash. American?

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: Oh no!

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: Jesus Christ!

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: What the hell...?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: That's the guy.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: This pizda? Never seen him before.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Who you workin' for? What do you do for a living, dickhead?

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: Uh... I am... I work in insurance.

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: What the hell are you doing?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Look what we have here. Czech 5-0 on the mack.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Cops. Like a plague. No matter how many you pay there's always another with his hand out. How did you pick him out?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: He flashed his badge to half the bar when he bought his drink.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: I appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Whatever you want, the rest of the night, consider it on the house.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Thanks, but I'm here on business. I heard you're the G around here. I'm looking for some cars, expensive ones. A lot of them.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Sorry, man, don't know what you're talking about.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I'm talking about the sports cars that disappear off the docks in Genoa and wind up here. If you don't know about 'em, who does?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I guess I heard wrong.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Xander Cage!

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: The X man! We seen your bootleg videos!

Speaker: viktor
Dialogue: You sick! You sick crazy on a board, on a bike! Everything!

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: This is insane, man. Xander Cage in Prague. Come on, sit. Sit with us.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: I remember that one where you jump the motorcycle over the freeway at rush hour.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: When else are you gonna do it?

Speaker: viktor
Dialogue: You almost died on that one.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Cops arrested me while I was still in surgery. Did two months.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: We seen all your shit! So you want cars? We get whatever cars you need. What are you looking for?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Ferrari's, Lamborghini's... high end pasta rockets. Ten to start.

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: Ten! No problem! We do that no problem!

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Ten is hardly worth the effort. We're talking a lousy million five U.S.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I have Japanese buyers who are looking to move a fleet, if you have the quality of merchandise they're after. And it's a mil two, max.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Do you know what a wire transfer is?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Is she for real? Honey, maybe you should quiet down and let the grownups have a conversation.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: My goodness, a word with four syllables. I should get some ice before your brain gets too hot.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Sure. Just chisel some off your heart.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: So cute. He shows up for a battle of wits with a mental butter knife.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Don't look at me, X, she handles all the details.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: It'll work faster if I have an account number.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: You'll have forty-eight hours to complete the transfer. Don't waste our time.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Wouldn't dream of it. I'm even gonna throw in a few extra bucks to send you to charm school.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Alright, now that business is finished, we party! Bitches, come! We have a drink and toast the deal!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I believe I can hang with you fellas for a while.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I guess you got my E-mail. I set up a purchase. Ten cars.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: If you're trying to push my buttons, you're on the right track. Don't make me question my own judgment, X.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Buddy, you sent me here to get close to their organization, that costs money.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: One point two million dollars? I did not authorize you to spend one point two million dollars!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I'm already on a first name basis with these dudes, I got a deal set up, you want me to hammer it or not?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: We're not after car thieves here.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What the hell am I after? You're telling me dick.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: That information is classified. You're there to gather information on their operations, period.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Call me crazy, but I thought hooking up a million dollar deal was a great way to get on their good side. What else? You gonna hassle me about the weapons and spy stuff too?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: My friend, if you're planning on crossing me...

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I know, poison needles in my shins. You've got 36 hours. Peace, out.

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: Ridiculous. Cut him off. I'm sorry Gibbons, you pulled up a shark this time.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: I think we should send him whatever he wants.

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: You what? A wire transfer of this size?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: If it means getting Silent Night back, absolutely.

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: You're talking about a very expensive risk here.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: He's gotten closer in 24 hours than all of the other operatives combined. He got us an account number to boot. Now even if he's just dumb and lucky, I say we back his play.  I put him out there, Sam. If he doesn't come up with the money, they'll kill him. I can't let that happen.

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: Why not? You were going to throw him in a tub full of acid, weren't you?

Speaker: sam tannick
Dialogue: Alright, do what you want. But keep the screws on him. He's a wild card. That could be either good or bad.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: So the odds are up to fifty-fifty? I can deal with that.

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: Your government must know something we don't.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: Hate those Russkie choppers. Rattle- trap pieces of garbage. I'm agent Shavers. Toby Lee Shavers. I'm looking for what's his name. Three X' s.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: That's would be me.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: Figures. You got someplace we can spread out my gear or what? I mean today.

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: I'll leave you two alone to talk.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Yeah, thanks a lot.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: Back off, just go away you klutz. Alright, here's the story. The items in these cases belong to me. I designed them, built them, and was going to use them in the field myself until you showed up.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I stole your beat, huh? Guess you forgot to brown-nose the right people.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: Is that supposed to be funny? I'm not laughing. I've worked for ten years to get my shot at being a field agent, funny boy. And ar the last minute I get bumped by you, some reject from the Ozzfest.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Why don't you show me some gear before you get hurt.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: Listen to you. Right away, sir, anything you say, sir.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What is all this? I didn't even order some of this stuff.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: You're gonna need it, rookie, trust me.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: An all-terrain mobile video monitoring system for surveillance. I call it the "Roach Cam". See the little camera it's got for a head?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Kinda looks like you.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: "Terminator" climbing claws.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: Miniature power cams set in on contact, giving you a sure grip on any surface.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: They come in any other styles or colors?

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: This is your standard dart gun.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: That one I'm real familiar with.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: You've got your chromium knock-out dart, microphone listening dart, explosive dart, even one with a splatter blood packet, whatever you need. They also come in a special 9mm casing for use with your service pistol.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: Multi-view binoculars. Nine different enhanced vision modes, plus a digital camera.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: Infrared, starlight... Even a special "penetrator" mode to see through walls, curtains, almost anything...

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I think I'll hang on to these.

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: Think again, that's government property. You have to sign for everything. I've got one more that wasn't on your list.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: From the Beastie Boys collection?

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: It's a stakeout suit. It's got food, water, recording gear, anything you need for covert spying. It's all- weather, fire retardant, and if you give this buckle a sharp pull, the whole outfit deploys into a parachute.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You're joking, right?

Speaker: shavers
Dialogue: Now that I've given you the overview, we're going to spend the next couple hours going into extensive operational detail.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I thought that was in detail.

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: So what you think? Beautiful!

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Has it arrived yet?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Nothing. He had two days.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Perhaps he is not all he says he is.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Very nice. I'm impressed.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: I'm somewhat less so. We seem to have a bit of a problem...

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I had to inspect the merchandise first.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Of course.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What's this?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: This is a gift. From me to you.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: It's a little nothing, you take it.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Come on, get in.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You're alright, Yorgi.

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: Smile, bychara.

Speaker: kirill
Dialogue: Yorgi!

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: What in the hell...?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: What's going on, my friend?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You tell me! You got a sniper up there or what?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: He's not with us, Xander. He must be with you.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Bullshit! You get your boy off that roof or I swear to God I'm gonna give you another hole to breathe out of.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Get him! Find out who he is!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I've got him. Buckle up.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: That's the cop from the club!

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: What are you doing? Get in the car!

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: I don't believe it! You can't shoot a cop in the middle of the street!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Had to do what I had to do.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: You say you get a million, you get the million. Some cop gives us shit, he's dead. Jesus Christ, man, you're hard-core!

Speaker: ivan 1
Dialogue: It's sweet.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Total chaos, man! Welcome to Anarchy 99!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What's "Anarchy 99"?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: It's all this craziness! It's what we've been living since 99, when we left the Army. One of our brothers died in Grozny and we said the hell with this shit. What for? He dies for what? Politics? Who's politics? Not ours.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You wanna see my politics?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Screw the world. If I'm gonna die for something, it better be bitches and money.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: That's what I'm talking about, man! That's why Anarchy 99 was born.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: To us it means no walls, no speed limits, no jails. It's everybody does what he wants. People think democracy is freedom but they don't have a clue. There's an old punk song. It says: "America stands for freedom, but if you think you're free..."

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: "...try walking into a deli and urinating on the cheese". 'Anarchy Burger' by the Vandals.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: You got it, man. It's stupid but it's true. True freedom is when you do whatever you want anytime you want. That's when you know you're living, man.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: How you gonna do that with government and rules everywhere?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Easy. You get enough money that you grow an ass big enough for the whole world to kiss.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: You hang with us, buddy, taste some freedom! Petra! Dance with this guy!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: This is great, dancing with the back of your head.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: If you got a problem with me, why are we dancing?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Yorgi asked me to.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You do everything Yorgi says?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Go to hell.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: It's gonna be like that, huh? You got all bent out of shape as soon as he started dancing with someone else. Why's that?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Mind your business.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Did you guys used to date? That's it, right? He broke your heart and you're still soft on him. That's funny, it don't seem to fit with a tough broad like you.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Where are you going?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Why are you still hanging around? Your business is finished, you should go home.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I was invited. What's your story?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: I don't know who you are or where you come from, but I don't like you. You ask too many questions.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Come on, don't front like that. You'll put a guy right off you.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Don't even bother, X man, I'm not your type.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: That right? Why's that?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: My chest is too small and my brain is too big.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Xander, check it out! The revolution begins!

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Let's get some air, man.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You got a great set-up here Yorgi. You really know how to live.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: It's a beautiful town, Prague. It's been good to me.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I've been here before, when I was a kid. My old man was in the service, we used to live on the Army base in Hamburg.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: You, an Army brat? I don't see that one at all. Did you join the service as well?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Hell no. My dad was a straight up tin soldier. Somehow he pissed this general off and got himself dishonorably discharged. Had a court martial and everything. The charges were total bullshit, so he was sure he'd get his name cleared, but it didn't happen.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Connections and politics, it's the same everywhere.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: My old man, he bought into the system, and it screwed him. So he swallowed a bullet. Me, I don't believe in nothing I can't see and touch.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Next week these idiots are having a peace conference here. What the hell are they going to talk about? It's the system itself that causes all the world's problems. You're okay, buddy. Come on, it's getting early.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: This way, girls, let's go!

Speaker: viktor
Dialogue: Diversified global operations. The sun never sets on our empire.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Not bad, yes? The original owners, they just one day decide to move out.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Yeb vas, z'opa. Shut up!

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: I've got meetings this afternoon, I've got to get some sleep. Just pick a girl.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: That's alright, I'm kinda tired.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: You want to insult me? This is my hospitality. Pick one.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Good, now find a room to crash in.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You gonna tuck us in?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Listen, no offense, but I'm not in the market right now, okay? You can stay here, but let's not --

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You don't understand a word I'm saying, do you?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Stupid, right? That's what I was trying to tell you. I just got out of this heavy thing...

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: The things I have to do for my country.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: What are you doing?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Looking for a phone book. I want to call a cab. Unless you wanna give me a ride?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Who are you?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: We hung out last night, remember?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: I also remember you drove your car here. Who are you really? Make no mistake, I will shoot you and not feel bad about it. Who are you working for?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Hey, take it easy. I'm just a dude trying to make a buck.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Bullshit. I see you look at everything, study everything, ask questions. I know exactly what you're doing. Empty your pockets.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You've got to relax, baby, you're paranoid.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Hey, you're good.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Maybe we should start again, yes? I know so little about you, except that you're not what you say you are.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: That makes two of us then, sweetheart, because I ain't buying your bullshit either. You're not like them, I can see it in your eyes. So you tell me, who's bullshitting who?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Something bothers me about you, Mr. Xander Cage...

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Get Kirill. Now!

Speaker: kirill
Dialogue: What's the problem?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: I'm inside the police mainframe. Do you see anything?

Speaker: kirill
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: I've searched their E-mail. No funeral announcement, no obituary, no call- to-arms. Nothing on the news, even. I swear I saw a cop get shot yesterday. How come no one is talking about it?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: I also check the wire transfer. I follow the money back to it's source, but there is no source. It comes from nowhere. First they bring CIA, then British SAS, now maybe they plumb the lower depths. Maybe now they send someone who looks like us. Maybe someone like our houseguest Mr. X.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: I don't know what you're talking about.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: The eyes don't lie. All this has gotten to you, hasn't it, Petra? You came in as Yorgi's girlfriend and you stayed because it was fun. Now you don't like it so much, but you're in so deep you can't get out anymore. Tell me if I'm wrong, Petra.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Go to hell!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Look at you. You're helping run things now. You're a gangster. I bet that snuck up on you. You woke up one day and you were a criminal.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: It's cool, I feel you. I might even be able to help. Here, let me show you something. You wanna see what's in my pocket, I'll show you.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: What are you?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I'm an information gatherer. You wanna go somewhere and talk about it?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Where is he?

Speaker: viktor
Dialogue: They went to breakfast.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Perogies, potato pancakes, fried goose livers, the sausage plate and a pot of Turkish coffee.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I'm just gonna have a garden salad. Oil and balsamic vinegar on the side.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: That's how you eat? It's like a gerbil.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I'm from L.A.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: So why don't you tell me something about who you gather information for. They obviously have very deep pockets. Are you from a rival clan?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Let's just say I'm freelancing and leave it at that.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Whoever sent you knew what they were doing. You and Yorgi are practically twins. Two nihilistic fashion victims who make a lot of noise but don't say much.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Don't judge a comic book by it's cover.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: You agree with a lot of what he says, don't you.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I know where he's coming from. The only thing I really don't get is why he dumped you. Up until I found that out, I thought his judgment was pretty sound.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Don't even start. I'll be honest, I don't trust you. Bur lets pretend for a minute that what you say is true, that I want to leave. What can you do about it?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: The people I know want facts, the kinds of things an insider would know. They're interested in putting Anarchy 99 out of business.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: All I have to do is risk my life providing you with these facts.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: We could work together. Then maybe we could both get the hell out of here. There's a beach in Bora Bora with my name on it.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: A beach named X? That I'd like to see.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: So there you have it. I guess you just have to ask yourself, how bad to you want out?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Da!

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What's up? Is there a problem?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: They tell me you're an American agent.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What are you talking about?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: There's no more time for games. They made you. There's a sniper out front waiting to put a bullet in your eye. Tell me if it's true.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: It's a long story, but yeah, more or less.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Jesus Christ. You're going to have to go out the back. The data that you copied with your toy. Tomorrow, at six o'clock. Look it up. We're taking a trip. Be there at six and you'll have plenty to tell your people.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: If I go out the back, he'll know you've warned me.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: That's alright, I'll figure something out.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Not an option. Just get up slowly like everything's cool. Petra, trust me. You just hung yourself out to dry for me, I'm not gonna let you down.

Speaker: kirill
Dialogue: Nice and easy, Petra...

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: I can't let this happen. I want you to go out the back. I'll make up some excuse.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: They'll kill you, you know they will. Besides, there is no back door. Keep smiling. Ready? Now.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Very nice.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Let's see what's going on inside...

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Ready the boat.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What the hell are you guys stealing?

Speaker: kirill
Dialogue: Ready.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: What are you doing?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: It all happened so fast. Such an unfortunate accident.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Let's go.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What the hell...?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: No way, man, no way. I'm just supposed to be an observer. Aw shit. This job sucks.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Toby Lee Shavers, if this thing don't work, your ass is kicked.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: What was that for?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: I'd forgotten how exciting it is working together.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: You've been so quiet lately, Petra, I thought you no longer cared.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Why don't we go below decks and work off some of this adrenaline.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Viktor! Stay the course.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Son of a bitch!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Is the boy alright?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Yes. I will cut the others loose, you must run the bilge pumps!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You sure?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Captain, huh? You get a lot of broads with that uniform?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: They call it "Ahab", it's a solar powered submersible. It can circumnavigate the globe on it's own. They use it to track and study the migration patterns of whales.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: You did say "Ahab"? You're sure about that?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Yeah, I sent you pictures. Here's what I'm thinking. If they take out the cameras and sensors, they could probably put a bomb in this thing. You drop it in the water in the Red Sea and three weeks later it's swimming up the Potomac.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: This is good work, X, damn fine work. You need to press on at all costs, find out what they have planned with this "Ahab".

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Hey, one miracle at a time. They're on to me now, remember?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: I'm gonna be en route with a team shortly to relieve you. Just keep the pressure on until the cavalry arrives. And X? You done yourself proud helping those people today.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Thanks.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: You're a grungy little phoenix, you know that? Keep up the good work.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You ain't seen nothing yet.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Get in. We've got work to do.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I want all that...  In there.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Right behind you.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: So what's the plan with this Ahab? Are they selling it or what?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: No, something worse. He says it's a surprise, but I know him. This is his masterpiece.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: We've got to find out what it is. Can you handle that?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: There's something I didn't have time to tell you before.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What's that?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: I'm a agent as well. KGB. I've been undercover for over a year.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You're what? What the hell have you been doing?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: I don't know. Eight months ago I stop hearing from my people. No explanation, just silence. So I stay and I wait like I was told. Soon I'm in so far, they'd kill me if I left. Now every day I get farther and farther away from what I was. I'm like you said, a criminal.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I'm busted up for you, but Jesus, what the hell are you doing? Those people almost drowned on that boat and you didn't lift a finger.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: No, I guess I've been no help at all to you.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Get your head back in the game. There are lives at stake here.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Of course. I'll do what I can. I have to go, before they notice.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: When can I see you again?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: You can't, it's too risky. I'm not much help anyway, remember?

Speaker: viktor
Dialogue: Okay, fire one.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Perfect!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Great piece of hardware.

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: "Silent Night... Holy Night"

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Damn.

Speaker: kirill
Dialogue: There's some bullshit going on!

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Xander, my friend, that can only be you. Why don't we put our weapons down for a few minutes and discuss this like friends. How would you like to come to work for us instead? We could Rage Against the Machine together.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Speaking of people that are full of shit, funny you should mention those guys!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: They put their records out through Sony, one of the biggest corporate machines on the planet. Some revolutionaries, huh?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Come on, you're the one who's fooling yourself. Why risk your life for your government when we can offer you a future that is truly free?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: He blew the gate control. Anders! Get the bastard!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Slovo?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Dude, what are you doing here?

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: You killed me, remember? Now I have to hide out here with you. Where have you been?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I found something big enough for us to take these guys down with. They've got a of nerve agent they're gonna unleash.

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: Is this what you're looking for?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Yeah, give it here.

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: Sorry, "dude".

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What's the deal?

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: Oh come on, don't feel bad. You got played, so what? You're new at this. Did you think you could just stroll into this business one day and have all the angles figured out?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Why you dogging me up?

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: They came and found me. They said they'd kill me unless I help them. Plus they offer me a lot of money. No big deal. These things happen. Dump your gun on the floor.

Speaker: slovo
Dialogue: Where do you want it? The head to be quick? Or the chest for an open casket?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Are you alright?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What the hell are you doing? You could've killed me!

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: I heard you talking. I could tell where you were in the room.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I don't know what's going on anymore. I thought I was square with that dude. Now everybody's switching sides like it's the WWF.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What are you doing with the Ivans?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: I know which cops are good and which are bad. Come with me. Come on, right now.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Where are we going?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: We're getting out of this place. We've done enough.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Wait a minute, whoa. We can't go now. What's Yorgi got planned with that nerve agent?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: It doesn't matter anymore, forget it.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Of course it matters. Hey, hold on!

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: What do we owe our governments? Yours kidnapped you, mine abandoned me.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Petra, this ain't about the people that sent us here, you know that.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: No, now it's about us. Let's do something for us before we both get killed. Don't you want to get to Bora Bora, Xander?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: We can't leave now. We have to do something.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Why? You're the one who believes in nothing. Screw the world, or whatever you said.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Alright, so I was full of shit. I thought believing in things was wrong. Turns out believing in nothing is worse. You might as well be dead. I'm not thrilled with the world, but I'm not gonna let those idiots start killing people. Come on, you're a cop, we've got to get these guys.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: They left. To a fortress in the mountains.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: We'll have to go after them.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Aren't you afraid?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: A long time ago I learned how to put fear away in a little place in my head. Maybe that's my problem. If you don't feel fear you can do some amazing things, but you can also screw your life up in ways you can't imagine.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: I must be healthy, then, because I'm scared to death. I guess I'd better get back to Yorgi.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You don't have to do that.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Yes, I do. You're right. I can't just let him go free. Besides, I can help you from the inside.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Aren't they gonna wonder were you've been?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: I've been lying for so long, one more time won't hurt.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: When this is over, we're just gonna take off, the two of us. Take a vacation.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: What the hell are we doing? We're doing all this together, trusting each other, making plans, and we haven't even slept together yet.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: That gives us something to live for.

Speaker: viktor
Dialogue: Hold positions!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Nothing like fresh powder.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Gibbons, long time no talk. You wouldn't believe my day.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: What the hell has been going on, Triple X? How about a status report?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Snow covered fortress. Army of bad guys. The usual.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: I'm on the way with a team to relieve you. What's the latest?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: They retrofitted Ahab with some kind of rocket launcher. They were loading canisters of liquid into it, light colored and dark colored in the same tube but separate. Something tells me this it that "classified" stuff you didn't want me to know about. Does the song "Silent Night" mean anything to you?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Yes it does.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Come on, Gibbons, you can do better then that.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Silent Night is the name of a top secret binary nerve agent. The glass canister is shot into the air and detonated. The black and white chemicals mix, forming a toxic cloud. When it settles down to Earth, it'll kill everything in the vicinity.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Jesus Christ, Gibbons, this is something we came up with?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Yeah, that's right. So now that you know, you understand why it's important that we get it back.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Kinda funny, though, isn't it? We're not supposed to be making weapons like that anyway. Guess we shoulda played by the rules.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Somebody else makes those decisions, not guys like you and me. You've done your job, X, head back to Prague. I'll be landing in 90 minutes. This is my operation now.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: We don't have that kinda time, boss, I don't think Prague's gonna be around much longer. I've gotta go now. I've got a lot of bad guys to kill.

Speaker: guard
Dialogue: What's going on?

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: That was for Anders.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Don't forget goatee boy. I greased him up on the diamond run.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Look who we found playing outside.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Petra, my sweet dove, do you notice anything strange about X? He looks slightly less than dead.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Yorgi, I thought he was --

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Do you think I didn't know about you all along? My contacts in the KGB told me you were coming. You show up undercover and, I must admit, you play your part to the hilt. When it's time to be cruel, you are cruel. When it's time to be passionate, you are very very passionate indeed.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: I could have killed you, but I thought this would be so much more fun. To twist you and use you how I see fit. And to be honest, you went much farther than I ever expected you would for your country.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: And you. Why do you have such a problem staying away, my friend? Did you miss us that much?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I wanted to get the hell out of Prague before Silent Night falls.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Not bad, man, not bad. You put things together quick. Prague it is.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: The Peace conference...

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Nice place to start, don't you think?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: What's the gimmick, Yorgi? That's the part I don't get. You gonna hold the world hostage with your gas bombs? I didn't think you were dumb enough to go with that hack cliche.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: You think I'm after money? I told you, my friend. Anarchy. Time for a change. Money is good, but for true freedom you have to get rid of the rules themselves.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: So all by yourself, you're going to destroy every government; in the world.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Easier than that, buddy. I'll get them to destroy each other. You kill an entire Peace conference, someone is going to have to pay. Then our friend Ahab continues down the river to the ocean and begins his world tour. London, Cairo, Beijing... Pretty soon everyone's involved. These guys bomb those guys, those guys invade these guys. Soon the whole world is like your wild West cowboy days. No rules, no law, everybody free to do what they want.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Including rape, pillage, murder.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Sure, if that's what you want. Why not? It's all human nature. So we just have to launch our baby and wait for the decline and fall of civilization as we know it.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: And here I thought "anarchy" was just something cool to put on a Tshirt.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Come on, Xander. You used to stand for something. What happened to you, man? I thought you'd get it.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Don't you see, X? For the betterment of humanity, he's going to start World War Three.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: He's a regular humanitarian. And all this time I thought he was just a tool.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: You both could have been a part of it. You could have ridden with us into a new day, the dawning of a new age of --

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Oh just shoot us already. I'm sorry I asked.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Screw you too, buddy.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: Hurry up, kill him!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Hey! We're on your side!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Petra! Tell them something!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: How's Ivan?

Speaker: ivan 2
Dialogue: He is okay.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Thanks for coming, man, you guys were right on time.

Speaker: ivan 2
Dialogue: We are always on time. Two have escaped, in truck.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Yorgi and Kirill.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Let me guess, they had a big white torpedo with them.

Speaker: ivan 2
Dialogue: Yes. Your friend, the angry one, he send something for you.

Speaker: ivan 2
Dialogue: We'll be right behind you.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Did you do your homework?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: If they launch it, I know how to bring it back.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Let's do this.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Where's he headed?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: He owns a big industrial complex on the river. He'll launch it from there.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: They're coming! Get back there.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You get down! I'll take care of this fool!

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: No! Don't shoot! He's hiding behind the nerve agent!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Goddamit! He's gonna stop playing around soon and shoot something valuable!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Let's see what my man put together.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Where'd the damn truck go?!

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Go to the water, it's that way!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Toadies right behind.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Let me.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Fantastic options.

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: I've got it, go! Cover me!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You okay?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: A piece of shrapnel hit me.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I'm sick of that guy. Let's stop playing nice.

Speaker: kirill
Dialogue: What are you doing!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I guess the surgeon general was right.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: He's shut out the communication circuit!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You can't talk to it?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: No, it's like a safety. We are going to have to access the manual controls.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: A manual control on a moving torpedo. This day keeps getting better and better.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Radio Ivan! Tell him what's going down! Have them evacuate downtown!

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: It's running three meters down. Twenty knots.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: It has to surface to release the nerve agent, right?

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: By then it's too late! The only way to safely dispose of the nerve agent is in deep water! The chemicals will break down and dissipate!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Use your grenades! Maybe we can blow it up underwater!

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: There it is! Hold it steady!

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Petra!

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: Xander! It's coming up!

Speaker: yorgi
Dialogue: This is going to be exciting, buddy! Front row seats to the apocalypse! Come on, sing with me!  "I am an Antichrist / I am an anarchist / I... wan-na be... Anarchy!"

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: No you don't.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Thought you bought the farm down there, X. Glad as hell to see you.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: I'm pretty happy to see me too. So are you done with me yet?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: You've kept up your end of the bargain, I'll do the same. But you really should consider staying on, you make a decent agent.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: But I hate cops, remember? Except for her.

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: Cut the crap, X, I saw you down there. You're a hero. Don't be afraid to join the good guys.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Who says you're the good guys?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: You know what they say, the only way to change the system is from the inside.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: Oh yeah? Why don't we start by taking this thing off my ankle? The poison needles?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: On come on, X. Did you really think we were that barbaric?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: No needles, huh? What about the acid bath?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: All for show. Just a psychological mind game to get you to do the right thing.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You're a jerk-off, you know that?

Speaker: gibbons
Dialogue: We'll be talking soon, you'll see. You'll be back.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: I can't believe my mission is finally over. I don't even know what to do with myself.

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: You can't welch on me now. We had a deal.

Speaker: petra
Dialogue: What are you doing?

Speaker: xander
Dialogue: It's about your next mission. You need to be debriefed.
